tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE MaintenanceData ( 
 id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
 equipment_id UUID, 
 maintenance_date DATE, 
 maintenance_type VARCHAR(100), 
 maintenance_description TEXT, 
 predicted_failure_date DATE 
 )

CREATE TABLE maintenance_record (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT,
  maintenance_date DATE,
  maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
  technician_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE equipment_maintenance (
  equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  last_maintenance_date DATE,
  next_maintenance_date DATE,
  maintenance_details TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE equipment_failure_predictions (
  prediction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT,
  prediction_date DATE,
  failure_probability FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE equipment_failures (
  failure_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT,
  failure_date DATE,
  failure_details TEXT
)
CREATE TABLE Equipment ( equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, equipment_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, last_maintenance_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, maintenance_notes TEXT );

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceLogs ( log_id INT PRIMARY KEY, equipment_id INT, maintenance_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, maintenance_details TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES Equipment(equipment_id) );

CREATE TABLE FailurePredictions ( prediction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, equipment_id INT, prediction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, predicted_failure_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, prediction_details TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES Equipment(equipment_id) );

CREATE TABLE EquipmentFailureHistory ( failure_id INT PRIMARY KEY, equipment_id INT, failure_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, failure_details TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES Equipment(equipment_id) );

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceData ( 
    equipment_id INT, 
    maintenance_date DATE, 
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50), 
    technician_id INT, 
    PRIMARY KEY (equipment_id, maintenance_date) 
);

CREATE TABLE EquipmentDetails ( 
    equipment_id INT, 
    equipment_name VARCHAR(100), 
    manufacturer VARCHAR(100), 
    purchase_date DATE, 
    PRIMARY KEY (equipment_id) 
);

CREATE TABLE FailurePrediction ( 
    prediction_id INT, 
    equipment_id INT, 
    prediction_date DATE, 
    prediction_result VARCHAR(100), 
    PRIMARY KEY (prediction_id) 
);

CREATE TABLE Technicians ( 
    technician_id INT, 
    technician_name VARCHAR(100), 
    technician_experience INT, 
    specialization VARCHAR(100), 
    PRIMARY KEY (technician_id) 
);

CREATE TABLE EquipmentFailureLogs ( 
    log_id INT, 
    equipment_id INT, 
    failure_date DATE, 
    failure_description TEXT, 
    technician_id INT, 
    PRIMARY KEY (log_id) 
);
